code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useMutation}from'@apollo/client';import{CREATE_ROOM}from'../graphql/mutations';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const RoomForm=()=>{const[hotelId,setHotelId]=useState('');const[roomTypeId,setRoomTypeId]=useState('');const[number,setNumber]=useState('');const[description,setDescription]=useState('');const[createRoom,{loading}]=useMutation(CREATE_ROOM,{onCompleted:()=>{console.log('Room created successfully');setHotelId('');setRoomTypeId('');setNumber('');setDescription('');},onError:error=>{console.error('Error creating room:',error.message);}});const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();createRoom({variables:{hotelId,roomTypeId,number,description}});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:hotelId,onChange:e=>setHotelId(e.target.value),placeholder:"Hotel ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:roomTypeId,onChange:e=>setRoomTypeId(e.target.value),placeholder:"Room Type ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:number,onChange:e=>setNumber(e.target.value),placeholder:"Number"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{value:description,onChange:e=>setDescription(e.target.value),placeholder:"Description"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",disabled:loading,children:"Submit"})]});};export default RoomForm;
